title: League of Legends Crash
body:
When ever I start a league game, I select my champion then load in. After it freezes and never comes back to life. Anyone know how to fix this?
(I don't have lolreplay)

replies.body: The freezing issue may be due to a recent update with Windows 10, which auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  The app is causing freezing issues for a few players, so disabling that may get this fixed for you!   Let me know if you have any questions!
